definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: A dewar tube with vacuum multi-layer insulated material is described in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种采用真空多层绝热材料制作的恒温器。

sentences.english: A static cultivation apparatus for the culture in vitro of Plasmodium falciparum gametocytes is described.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制恒温恒气装置静态培养恶性疟原虫配子体。

sentences.english: The cam member operably connects a temperature control knob to the thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮元件把一个温度控制旋钮可操作地连接于恒温器。
安装一个设定程序的恒温调节器。

sentences.english: It has been found that the coercive force is very sensitive to the temperature of isothermal magnetic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 发现矫顽力对恒温热磁处理温度极为敏感。

sentences.english: The swimming pool is in-door heated.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里是恒温游泳池。

sentences.english: Large wine cellar with constant temperature and humidity, keeps the most original flavor and sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 恒温恒湿大型酒窖，锁住最原汁原味的情怀。

sentences.english: Pre-heating oven. Oil heating for bronzing plate, constant temperature auto control, oil pump circulation.
sentences.chinese: 烫金版油加热，恒温自动控制，油泵循环。

sentences.english: These fans have a thermostatically controlled viscous clutch.
sentences.chinese: 这些风扇有一个恒温控制的粘液离合器。

sentences.english: The thermostat on the balcony's doorpost?
sentences.chinese: 这条阳台门柱上的恒温器？

sentences.english: The research content of this paper is driver part of switch-mode constant temperature controller.
sentences.chinese: 本文的研究内容是开关式恒温控制系统的驱动部分。
哺乳动物都是恒温动物。

sentences.english: Spend time shopping for the right mattress and pillow, and adjust your thermostat to the best temperature for you.
sentences.chinese: 购买合适的床垫和枕头，将恒温器调到最适合的温度。

sentences.english: Shading and fixed temperature can not affect diurnal curve pattern of net photosynthetic rate for polygonatwn odoratum.
sentences.chinese: 遮光和恒温不能改变其净光合速率日变化曲线的类型。

sentences.english: The oven operates on the air -bath principle.
sentences.chinese: 恒温槽工作基于空气浴原理。

sentences.english: Grapes are destemmed and fermented in temperature controlled stainless steel tanks.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄经去茎后置于恒温的不锈钢桶中发酵。

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
